statements: SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, role FROM users WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT user_id, username FROM users ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE password = 'password123';
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM users WHERE role = 'user';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT username, role FROM users WHERE user_id > 2 ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT role) AS distinct_roles FROM users;
SELECT username, password FROM users WHERE user_id IN (3, 4, 5) ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username, role FROM users WHERE role='admin';
SELECT username, password FROM users WHERE user_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM user_permissions WHERE permission_type LIKE '%read%';
SELECT user_id, COUNT(permission_id) AS num_permissions FROM user_permissions GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(permission_id) > 2;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT username, role FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, username, role FROM users WHERE role IN ('admin', 'editor');
SELECT * FROM users ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT u.username, p.permission_type FROM users u JOIN user_permissions p ON u.user_id = p.user_id;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, role FROM users WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT user_id, username, role FROM users WHERE role != 'admin';
SELECT * FROM user_roles ORDER BY role_name DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, role FROM users WHERE role = 'moderator' ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT * FROM user_roles ORDER BY role_name DESC;
SELECT user_id, password FROM users WHERE role = 'editor' AND password IS NOT NULL;
SELECT u.username, r.role_name FROM users u JOIN user_roles r ON u.role = r.role_name;
SELECT DISTINCT table_name FROM data_access WHERE access_level = 'admin';
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, role FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, username, role FROM users WHERE role = 'Admin';
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'J%';
SELECT * FROM users ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT * FROM users JOIN roles ON users.role = roles.role_name;
SELECT user_id, username, role_name FROM users JOIN roles ON users.role = roles.role_name WHERE users.user_id = 1;

SELECT username, role, permission_name FROM users JOIN roles ON users.role = roles.role_name JOIN user_permissions ON users.user_id = user_permissions.user_id JOIN permissions ON user_permissions.permission_id = permissions.permission_id;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE role = 'admin';

SELECT username, permission_name FROM users JOIN user_permissions ON users.user_id = user_permissions.user_id JOIN permissions ON user_permissions.permission_id = permissions.permission_id WHERE users.role = 'admin';
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE role='admin';
SELECT role_id, role_name FROM roles WHERE role_name='Moderator';
SELECT user_id, username, role FROM users WHERE role='user' ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(role_id) AS total_roles FROM user_roles GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_roles > 1;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE role='admin';
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE role='user' ORDER BY username DESC;

SELECT users.username, roles.role_name FROM users JOIN user_roles ON users.user_id = user_roles.user_id JOIN roles ON user_roles.role_id = roles.role_id WHERE roles.role_name='admin' ORDER BY users.username ASC;
SELECT users.username, COUNT(*) as num_roles FROM users JOIN user_roles ON users.user_id = user_roles.user_id GROUP BY users.username HAVING num_roles > 1 ORDER BY num_roles DESC;

SELECT users.username, roles.role_name, permissions.permission_name FROM users JOIN user_roles ON users.user_id = user_roles.user_id JOIN roles ON user_roles.role_id = roles.role_id JOIN role_permissions ON roles.role_id = role_permissions.role_id JOIN permissions ON role_permissions.permission_id = permissions.permission_id;
